items.sentence: Tom started singing, and we all left the room.
You can come whenever it's convenient for you.
Why didn't you stay in Boston a little longer?
It's a pity that you'll never know who it was.
Tom didn't say what kind of bicycle he wanted.
Don't let Tom do anything you think is unsafe.
Can you locate where we are on the map for me?
Have you been to the Canadian embassy website?
Don't worry. We have plenty of food and water.
When was the last time you kissed your mother?
My mother isn't very strict, but my father is.
When did you have this passport picture taken?
Don't pay more for something than you have to.
I don't think doing that'll be worth our time.
I don't think I'll have time for that anymore.
I'm not sure that this translation is correct.
I have a feeling that Tom is going to be late.
Addressing one's boss as "omae" is unheard of.
We don't go out to eat as often as we used to.
How much does it cost to get to Boston by bus?
The child I was trying to help started crying.
Would you like for me to teach you how to sew?
I'll rely on my father for half of my tuition.
I'll get around to doing that sooner or later.
I'll tell Tom to do that if I don't forget to.
I'll wait until you've finished your homework.
I'll make sure that Tom never does that again.
I'll see if I can get Tom to agree to do that.
We need to know everything you know about Tom.
We need to pay back the money that we owe Tom.
The elevator doors opened, and Tom walked out.
I became a doctor so that I could help people.
You're not going to drive home drunk, are you?
How old were you when you had your first kiss?
If you really were there, you must've seen it.
Tom often spends his free time reading novels.
Tom wore a mask so no one would recognize him.
Tom wore a mask so nobody would recognize him.
Tom ran so fast we couldn't catch up with him.
Tom grumbled about the way people treated him.
I've finally gotten used to doing it this way.
Tom told me that he doesn't understand French.
I'm not going to go back to Boston ever again.
Will both of these suitcases fit in the trunk?
Every Canadian I've ever met does it that way.
Tom asked Mary to stop asking silly questions.
Tom's sister didn't invite him to her wedding.
Tom's wife is pregnant with their third child.
Tom tried to learn to play a brass instrument.
I don't mind working with Tom when he's sober.
